short_summary: Requisition of items from the Canadian Army Advanced Warfare Center
description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT.Application, which may be transmitted via postal services or electronically, for the supply of CABLE HOUSING ASSEMBLY, APR, CT-6 (Identification, Part No. ID-62-6639-503) by the Canadian Army Advanced Warfare Center (CAAWC).
tags: Contract Requireves GST/HST Withholding Tax Remittance.
full_summary:
### Replenishment of CT-6 APR Power Cables
#### Item Description
The Department of National Defence is seeking a supplier for the procurement of Cable Housing Assembly, APR, CT-6. The item details are as follows:

* **Item Part Number**: ID-62-6639-503
* **Item NCAGE**: 09511
* **Quantity**: 80 units
* **Unit of Issue**: Each
* **Delivery Location**: Canadian Army Advanced Warfare Center, Trenton

The procurement is managed under the procurement contract type noted as **B-**, solicitation number W8485-247641/B.

### Key Tender Details

* **Notice Type**: **Request for Proposal**
* **Procurement Category**: *Goods and Services*
* **Procurement Method**: **Competitive**
* **Procurement Status**: **Expired**
* **Trade Agreements**: *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) *Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)'

### Contact Information
For all inquiries regarding this tender, please contact:

* **Audree Poissant-Viau**
	+ **Email**: audree.poissant-viau@forces.gc.ca
	+ **Phone**: Not Available
	+ **Fax**: Not Available

### Notice Documents
Documents regarding this procurement are available for download from [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8613/w8485-247641.b---bid-solicitaion-%28en-canada-buys.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8613/w8485-247641.b---bid-solicitaion-%28en-canada-buys.pdf) or [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8613/w8485-247641.b---bid-solicitaion-%28fr-achats-canada.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8613/w8485-247641.b---bid-solicitaion-%28fr-achats-canada.pdf)

Note: 
Due to the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic, bidders are encouraged to transmit their proposals electronically using the epost Connect service instead of any of the other methods of proposal delivery usually available.
